label: Caves Of Dragonmount
description:
Somewhere in the kingdom, Chester, a friendly dragon, lands at the entrance to the "Caves of Dragonmount."
Chester walks around the cave system trying to find his friends.
Chester then leaves, and flies around while looking some more.

Chester lands at the base of Dragonmount, a vast mountain range with an elaborate cave system underneath.
In an attempt to locate 3 of his friends, he goes into the caves.

Hit 1 if you wish to enter Glint's cave.
Hit 2 if you wish to call out to Ember in front of her cave.
Hit 3 if you wish to examine Shade's cave.

Hit 0 to quit.
